name: Using Twine to do Close Reading of Poetry
name_original: Using Twine to do Close Reading of Poetry
description:
Students are accustomed to digging into a passage in a text adventure. 

Why not use Twine to have them do the same with assigned literature? You can make games for them as models and then have each student make a game focused on a very short passage of poetry to share with others and even use as a basis for an essay.
